headline: New Sun Country Airlines Credit Card from Synchrony Rewards Travelers Every Time They Fly
summary: Synchrony (NYSE: SYF), a leading consumer financial services company, and Sun Country Airlines (NASDAQ: SNCY) today announced the launch of a new credit card program focused on rewarding leisure travelers for both flights and everyday purchases. New cardmembers can earn 25,000 points when they spend $1,000 in the first 90 days after opening a new account.*
